trans-unit.source: Creates a Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature.
trans-unit.target: Crea una firma del Algoritmo de firma digital (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: La instancia del algoritmo de firma digital (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) que contiene la clave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter" /> con la clave especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Datos que van a firmar.

trans-unit.source: Creates the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Crea la firma PKCS #1 del algoritmo de firma digital (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) para los datos especificados.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: La firma digital de los datos especificados.

trans-unit.source: The resulting signature data can be verified by using <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Datos de la firma resultante pueden comprobarse mediante <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbHash" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The OID is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: OID es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: The DSA key is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La clave DSA es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del algoritmo hash que se utiliza para el formateador de firmas.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica el algoritmo hash para el formateador de firmas del algoritmo de firma digital (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="strName" /> parameter does not map to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" /> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: El par√°metro <paramref name="strName" /> no se asigna al algoritmo hash <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" /> que contiene la clave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica la clave que se va a utilizar para el formateador de firmas del algoritmo de firma digital (<see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> es <see langword="null" />.
